Key Match Events: Shubman Gill (7) struggled to get going from the onset and departed in the 3rd over
Suryakumar Yadav got run out soon after, escalating the troubles for the visiting side
Ishan Kishan (27) also did not look in rhythm and was cleaned up by Romario Shepherd in the 10th over
Sanju Samson walked in at the No. 5 position and began positively with a beautiful boundary playing a cut short on the offside
Sanju Samson perished after a couple of balls when he stepped out to go big against left-arm spinner Akeal Hosein
Post-Match Reflections: Fans were disappointed that Sanju Samson could not utilize the chance and make it count by bailing India out of a troubling situation
Fans expressed their frustration on the matter through reactions on Twitter
Former Indian player Wasim Jaffer recently pointed out that Sanju Samson has struggled to maintain consistency in his performances in his short international career
Others: India vs West Indies 2023 second T20I was played at the Providence Stadium, Guyana
Team India batted first in the second T20I after winning the toss
